hero_image.alt: Hero image for Confined Space Entry Permit Requirements in Queensland: The Definitive 2026 Compliance Guide

image_prompt: A hyper-realistic, professional wide shot of a modern industrial manufacturing facility in Queensland. In the foreground, a diverse group of safety officers and maintenance technicians are conducting a toolbox talk near a large stainless steel mixing tank (confined space). They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, high-visibility orange and yellow vests with reflective strips, safety glasses, and steel-toed boots. One technician is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) showing a digital checklist. A tripod and winch system is set up over the tank entry point. The lighting is bright and industrial. No text or words in the image. The atmosphere conveys safety, professionalism, and modern technology.
